title: Ticket #3710: Tool to re-create submit file
description: Also as per discussion at lunch today -- it might be useful to have a tool that you can point at a job, and get back a submit file that will re-create that job if re-submitted.
remarks:
2013-Jun-19 13:28:02 by adesmet:
Potential use case: I have a crondor job that I want to resubmit on a different computer before decommissioning this computer, but I lost the original submit file. The job is in the current queue.

Potential use case: I have an old, completed job that I want to re-run. The job is in the history.

2013-Sep-11 17:13:10 by wenger:
From htcondor-users: I would like to include:
  • An option to support for big submit files with several Queue commands inside, if one of them fail, generate a condor_submit file for later into the "InitialDir".
  • A debug option for DAG (-debug 8 maybe) to print the submit file to be launched.
creator: wenger
